results.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of knowledge, but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
results.reason: Highlights the importance of revering God and His wisdom.
results.reflection: True wisdom starts with a healthy fear and respect for God.

results.text: It is a dreadful thing to fall into the hands of the living God.
results.reason: Emphasizes the awe-inspiring power and judgment of God.
results.reflection: May this truth lead us to seek His mercy and grace.

results.text: Anyone whose name was not found written in the book of life was thrown into the lake of fire.
results.reason: Portrays the sobering consequence of rejecting salvation.
results.reflection: Let us strive to ensure our names are written in the Lamb's book of life.

results.text: Then he will say to those on his left, 'Depart from me, you cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels.'
results.reason: Describes the fate of those who are separated from God.
results.reflection: May we heed the call to align our lives with God's will and avoid eternal separation.

results.text: But I will show you whom you should fear: Fear him who, after your body has been killed, has authority to throw you into hell. Yes, I tell you, fear him.
results.reason: Directly addresses the concept of fearing God's judgment.
results.reflection: Let the fear of God lead us to repentance and obedience.
